feature-1.title: Story Memory
feature-1.description: Our AI remembers every part of your story! From the friends you meet to the treasures you find, the book follows your story telling!

feature-2.title: Your Story
feature-2.description: Go anywhere, do anything! Take your character from climbing mountains to flying jets to walking on the moon.

feature-3.title: Your Characters
feature-3.description: Create any character you can imagine! Bring your wildest ideas to life!

feature-4.title: Magic Redraws
feature-4.description: Modify each page with just a few words! Add a heroâ€™s hat, a magical sword, or anything else you imagine

feature-5.title: Easy & Fast
feature-5.description: Make your colouring book and print it out in minutes!
